tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
HIGHLY RECOMENDABLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Wow!! They are exceptional in what they are doing. Doctors have explained the issue very clearly and suggested the treatment based on the social and economical situation of the patient.. Really appriciable!!

Doctor are understanging the issue clearly, Explaing the issue to to patient very patiently, suggesting all the available treatments for the issue and providing the optoin to choose the treatment based on our convinience. I visited today and was never this happy after meeting any doctor. 

They are very friendly with the patient, they made me more comfortable especially Dr.Rachana we are good friends already :) 

HIGHLY RECOMENDABLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Balaji knows what he does. He explains every bit of the treatment procedure beforehand and prepares you well. I am getting treated for closing gaps thru invisible aligners. Very affordable treatment and doctor is easily approachable to answer your questions. I would recommend Dr. Balaji to my friends and family so to you as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited the clinic for crown fitting.  The clinic is super neat with friendly staff. We interacted with Dr.Balaji and Dr. Rachna. Both explained the procedure and answered all our questions patiently. We are so glad to find this clinic and would highly recommend this place to anyone seeking help with dental treatment

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Balaji and Rachna Balaji are my doctors from past 11 years .. They always do the best job and make sure the patient is satisfied with the work done by them.. I really appreciate their work environmentâ€¦ in Covid time also they have taken all the precautions and looking after the patients very nicely.. highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very courteous and friendly in his interaction with his patients. What I liked most is the time taken by the doctor to explain the various types of treatments that are available for me to choose from with the pros and cons of each type of treatment. I'm very impressed with all aspects of what he has to offer his patients.
reply_text: Thanks so much, I am happy that I could help

review: I came to Dr. Balaji with lot of pain and he took care of me. Another dentist told me I had to do cap etc but Dr. Balaji said just fillings is sufficient and did what is right and enough. He explained everything patiently and told me what is needed. I never told him what the other dentist told me but I realised from now he is my family dentist. He even works on Sundays which is good.
